Title: 18. Portals at BattleBox
Description: 28th Mar-29th Jun   Those in the know would have visited Battlebox before, a historical WWII bunker nestled in Fort Canning Park . Currently, thereâ€™s a Portals exhibition paying homage to the events that occurred in the past through interactive installations created by 7 local artists. Each room portrays how our nation fell when the British surrendered via displays that use art and technology to create sounds and visuals.  Admission: Free Venue: Battlebox, Fort Canning Park Dates: 28th Mar-29th Jun
